name: My Story (itch)
description:
The game is a Graphic Novel that follows the story of Jackie, a 9 years old girl that suffers from an abusive family. Jackie meets I, an imaginary dragon that will help her to realize that her imagination has more power than she thought. Your decisions will change Jackie's Story, making it your story.

If you let the nightmares gain force, they will become real and the will consume you.
